name: The Goodchild Chair
description: This sophisticated Goodchild provides an elegant silhouette for a room scheme with its modest but memorable profile, making it perfect for any dining room, dressing room or even as an elegant office chair. With legs finished in a dark-tinted beech, this glamorous chair brings together deep, rich tones and the more muted hues of the upholstery. Its classic yet distinct shape makes this chair a versatile addition to your interior, suiting both a minimalist, modern d√©cor, and a more traditional dining space. The Goodchild is fully customisable and can be upholstered in your favourite fabric or leather to perfectly suit your interior.
